item.title: Interactive Mapping using Shapefiles and Plotly
item.description: There are many packages and options to display data on maps, but until recently Iâ€™d never worked with shapefiles as a way to receive and work with spatial objects. A friend asked me to create an interactive map of state congressional districts using some political data, and it gave me an opportunity to learn a lot about plotting with shapefiles. The Shapefiles I worked with shapefiles from Daily Kos Elections.
